name: Math Runner (Scratch)
description:
How to Play Math Runner:

Move your Mouse to Pick an Equation.

If you touch +? (eg: 10) your points will add up

If you touch -? (eg: 4) your points will go down.

If you touch x? (eg: 3) your points will be multiplied.

if you touch =? (eg: 5) your points will be set to (any number).
